text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: It's hard to believe that this was just a qualifying round, but it was a great, heated race!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Next up is the semifinals, where you will face the others powerful enough to make it through. It will surely be an even tougher race.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'm looking forward to your continued success!
